lessons.japanese: 先だって彼にあったときには、彼はとても元気だった。
lessons.english: Last I met him, he was very well.

lessons.japanese: 先だって彼にあったときには、彼はとても元気だった。
lessons.english: The last time I saw him, he was very healthy.

lessons.japanese: 先だって、ごく短期間だが、久方ぶりにヨーロッパへ行った。
lessons.english: Recently, I got to go to Europe for the first time in a while, although it wasn't for very long.

lessons.japanese: 先だって、ごく短期間だが、久方ぶりにヨーロッパへ行った。
lessons.english: Recently, I got to go to Europe for the first time in a while, although it wasn't for very long.
